subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: On the night Arsène Wenger notched his 18th anniversary as coach of Arsenal, one of the team's younger players, Danny Welbeck, had his first professional hat trick.
snippet: On the night Arsène Wenger notched his 18th anniversary as coach of Arsenal, one of the team's younger players, Danny Welbeck, had his first professional hat trick.
